definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger

sentences.english: If you have insurance under a student plan, it probably will end in mid-August.
sentences.chinese: 如果你买的是学生险，保险可能会在八月中旬到期。

sentences.english: It's better for you to view the leaflet before you make any decision.
sentences.chinese: 你最好在决定保什么险之前先看看说明书。

sentences.english: P. A. and the Risk of Breakage for 130% invoice value.
sentences.chinese: 保水债险和破碎险，金额为130%的发票金额。

sentences.english: Who will pay the premium for the risk of breakage?
sentences.chinese: 加保破碎险的费用由谁负担？

sentences.english: Too big a risk, even with Mr. Eastwood at the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 纵使有伊斯特伍德保驾护航，冒的险也忒大了吧。

sentences.english: As you know, all goods delivered for us within the country are covered by a blanket insurance policy.
sentences.chinese: 您知道，所有在国内运输的货物，我们都包了综合险。

sentences.english: The insurance rate for such kind of risk will vary according to the kind.
sentences.chinese: 保险的范围写在基本保险单和各种险别的条款里。

sentences.english: Scouting is a risky maneuver but it can pay off.
sentences.chinese: 侦察是一项危险的行动，但这个险值得冒。

sentences.english: The coverage is W.P.A. plus Risk of Breakage。
sentences.chinese: 投保的险别为水渍险加破碎险。

sentences.english: That mountain is high and steep.
Of course. There are three basic covers.
Our goods are very valuable, so Iwant insure against all risks.
sentences.chinese: 我们的商品很宝贵，所以我想保全险。

sentences.english: Strikes, Riots and Civil Commotions (S. R. C. C. )
This insurance policy insures us against All Risks.
sentences.chinese: 本保险单为我们投保了一切险。

sentences.english: Do you cover risk other than W. P. A. War Risk?
sentences.chinese: 除了水渍险和战争险外，你们还保其他险吗？

definition: to be more scared than hurt (idiom)/to get through a daunting experience without mishap
to escape unscathed/to get through in one piece
to fight with all one has
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to lose one's life/to get killed
